meaningMnemonic:
When you've <kanji>finish</kanji>ed <kanji>solv</kanji>ing something, you've come to a point of <vocabulary>understanding</vocabulary>. 

了解 is less about deep comprehension and more about understanding something on a practical level. It's used to acknowledge receipt of information or instructions, similar to "<vocabulary>Got it</vocabulary>" or "<vocabulary>Understood</vocabulary>."
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
